translation:
If you associate the tool with the pmx or x file extension, you can launch the viewer by double-clicking the file.
You can also apply motions and toggle material display.

Displays the selected materials. By default, all materials are selected and displayed.
When you select a material, only the selected material will be displayed.
You can invert the selection by holding the Ctrl key while clicking.

id: モデルファイルを選択してください
translation:
Please select a model file
Pmx or X files can be opened.

id: モーションファイルを選択してください
translation:
Please select a motion file
Vmd or Vpd files can be opened.
